amendment.description: An amendment numbered 34 printed in House Report 118-142 to prohibit the display of unapproved flags.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the display of unapproved flags.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 313).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Norman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 313).
